message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving for you while securing the purchase of a highly sought-after item. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly. I look forward to your positive response.
